Articles.Content: Hey guys, I\'m a CAD drafter with a love of sci-fi and drawing up starships in my spare time, so when a friend recommended this game to me I just had to try it. I\'ve been playing for about a week or so and loved every minute of it. I\'ve designed a few (mostly) reliable rockets (can\'t get the hang of spaceplanes though), made a few trips around the Mun, gotten the hang of getting to orbit, and even had a few survivable landings.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
